The Form Package Example

The Form package enables you to create powerful forms backed with the Ext Data package.

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.form.Panel
  • datefield
  • fieldLabel
  • hbox
  • labelAlign
  • layout
  • textfield
[example]

See Also:

  • The Form Package Guide
  • Ext.form.Panel Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.form.Panel', {
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
        title: 'User Form',
        height: 100,
        width: 515,
        defaults: {
            xtype: 'textfield',
            labelAlign: 'top',
            padding: 10
        },
        layout: {
            type: 'hbox'
        },
        items: [{
            fieldLabel: 'First Name',
            name: 'firstName'
        }, {
            fieldLabel: 'Last Name',
            name: 'lastName'
        }, {
            xtype: 'datefield',
            fieldLabel: 'Date of Birth',
            name: 'birthDate'
        }]
    });
});
